Text: English subtitles for an English speaking TV show waldorfx? WTF!!??

@taylise : Yes and it helps a lot of people around the world to translate it...
The english accent is not easy to understand for a lot of people even if they can ready it perfectly... So the subtitles are really helpful and appreciated ! Thx Waldorfx ;)
taylise, there are also people like me who are hearing impaired AND also like watching tv. Lip reading is natural for me but the subtitles help a lot!

And then there's people like me, perfect hearing and perfect understanding of English but for the life of me I don't understand why I keep missing words, therefore titles are a must.  I get my titles from podnapisi dot net.
I get my subs from addic7ed. No special reason, just stuck with it for a long time.
